## Feature Summary
A brief description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem/Use Case
What problem does this feature solve? What use case does it address?

## Proposed Solution
Describe how you think this feature should work. Include:
- User interface changes (if any)
- New commands or keyboard shortcuts
- Configuration options
- Integration points

## Alternative Solutions
Have you considered any alternative approaches?

## Additional Context
- Screenshots or mockups if applicable
- Links to similar features in other tools
- Any research or examples you've found

## Implementation Notes
If you have technical suggestions:
- Which files would need to be modified
- Potential challenges or considerations
- Dependencies that might be needed
